price: Bityo, Allah azabarinda (abamwemeye) ibibi by’uwo munsi, kandi azabaha kurabagirana (mu buranga bwabo) ndetse n’ibyishimo.
arabic: فَوَقَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمِ وَلَقَّىٰهُمۡ نَضۡرَةٗ وَسُرُورٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: fawaqāhumu al-lahu sharra dhālika al-yawmi walaqqāhum naḍratan wasurūran
translations: and will cause them to meet
